vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with ETTL Engineers and Consultants, Inc. to continue to provide construction material testing services during construction of the Tyler Street/Polk Street Two-way Conversion - Not to exceed $42,354.00, from $49,105.00 to $91,459.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation Improvements Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
